question:
MATA PELAJARAN    : BAHASA INGGRIS
1. This is my new bag. Its color is black. It is made of strong fabric. It is quite big and spacious. It can
contain all of my school things. This bag is inexpensive. It only costs Rp 300.000
a. What is the size of the bag?
b. It can contain all of my school things. The word "it" refers to?
Complete these sentences by using the words in the box.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

MATA PELAJARAN

: BAHASA INGGRIS

1. Ini tas baruku. Warnanya hitam. Itu terbuat dari kain yang kuat. Ini cukup besar dan luas. Bisa

berisi semua hal sekolah saya. Tas ini murah. saya

Penjelasan:

MATA PELAJARAN

: BAHASA INGGRIS

1. This is my new bag. Its color is black. It is made of strong fabric. It is quite big and spacious. It can

contain all of my school things. This bag is inexpensive. It only costs Rp 300.000

a. What is the size of the bag?

b. It can contain all of my school things. The word "it" refers to?

Complete these sentences by using the words in the box.

related_questions.question: 3. What is the purpose of retelling a narrative, please explain?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The importance of retelling stories is that it allows students to learn to organize and describe events, which enhances reading comprehension.

related_questions.question:
For questions number 18 to 20, Complete the following text with the suitable words.    Mr.Komar is an English teacher. He speak English fluently.
His wife, Mrs. Nani is a(18)......She helps sick people.
She doesn't speak English. Mr.Komar has two children.
They study English not only at school but also at home.
They are(19).....students. Their father teaches them every night,
So they can speak English (20) ......He is very proud of them.
18. a. teacher
b. janitor
c. doctor
d. chef
19. a. lazy
b. proud
c. stupid
d. diligent
20. a. fluently
b. silently
C. slowly
d. badly
This text is for questions number 21 to 23.
My favorite animal is rabbit. Rabit has two longears.
Its eyes are big and black, but when it is dark its eyes are red.
It has two long teeth Its nose is small and soft pink.
Its tail is soft,round and small like a cotton ball. Its legs are small,
It doesn't walk, it jumps It is vegetarian and its favorite food is carrct.
Rabbits are very cute.
21. How many ears does the rabbit have?
a. two ears
c. three ears
b. four ears
d. five ears​

answers.answer:
18. C. Doctor

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas menjelaskan pekerjaan Mrs. Nani yang membantu orang sakit. Jadi, jawabannya adalah (C.)

19. D. Diligent

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan mereka selalu belajar Bahasa Inggris setiap malam dan mereka sangat rajin, Jadi jawabannya adalah (D.)

20. A. Fluently

Penjelasan :

Teks diatas mengatakan bahwa Mr. Komar sangat bangga dengan anak-anak nya karena bisa berbahasa Inggris dengan lancar. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

21. How many ears does the rabbit have?

: A. Two ears

Penjelasan :

Berdasarkan teks diatas, kelinci adalah binatang favorit sang penulis dan kelinci itu mempunyai 2 telinga. Jadi jawabannya adalah (A.)

Maaf kalau ada yang salah dalam penyampaian kata²nya, apabila ada yang salah dalam jawabannya bisa dikoreksi yaa, semoga membantu ! <3

—Miranthi P.

related_questions.question:
Dimas Do you have favorite novels?    Rino Thave two favorite novels. The llounted House
and The Secret Place
Dimas What kind of novel are they?
Rino The Hounted House is a horror novel, and
The Secret Place is a detective story
Dimas Which one is thicker?
Rino · The Haunted House has 50 pages, but the
Secret Place has 75 pages,
Dimas How much did you buy those novels?
Rino : The Haunted House is Rp. 35.000, and The
Secret Place is Rp. 125.000
Dimas: I like detective story, too. May I borrow yours
sometimes?
Rino Certainly! You may come to my house because
I have more interesting story books to read
26. Who likes detective story?
A Dimas.
C None
B. Rino
D. Dimas and Rino​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Dimas

Penjelasan:

karena di situ Dimas bilang "i like detective story'"

maaf kalau salah ya, semangat belajar nya

related_questions.question:
25. Pram: "What are we going to do after work?"    Yuni : "We can have dinner at the plaza at 7 if you
like."
Pram: "Sounds good. I'll pick you up at 6.30. We
need half an hour to get there.
Where will they probably be at six forty-five?
A. At the Plaza.
B. In the office.
C. Still at work.
D. On the way to the Plaza
E. They will meet at Plaza​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D

Penjelasan:

Arti

Pram : "Apa yang akan kita lakukan setelah selesai bekerja?"

Yuni :"Kita bisa makan malam di plaza jam 7 jika kamu mau"

Pram :"Baiklah. Aku akan menjemputmu pada jam 6.30. kita butuh setengah jam untuk sampai kesana."

karena untuk sampai ke Plaza kira kira pada jam 7. Maka pada saat jam 6.45, mereka masih otw ke plaza.

Jadi jawabannya adalah D

b. Tony and Andika have their own opinion

Penjelasan:

maaf banget ya kalau salah. semangat belajar nya

in my opinion, the answer is A.

Penjelasan:

Tony supports Andika's opininon by saying that the Government had decided "reboisasi" program to save our forest.

Idk whether it's true or not, but I hope it can help you, sorry if I'm wrong :)
